CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Emergency Medical Center?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Emergency Medical Center is arc {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Rural Township Clinic?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Rural Township Clinic is arc {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {TCM Hospital} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Maternal and Child Health Center} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Rural Township Clinic to TCM Hospital in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Maternal and Child Health Center to Emergency Medical Center in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Maternal and Child Health Center and Rural Township Clinic in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Maternal and Child Health Center and Rural Township Clinic is {201}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Rural Township Clinic and Maternal and Child Health Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Rural Township Clinic and Maternal and Child Health Center is {109}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Emergency Medical Center?
SC.A: The total flow output from Emergency Medical Center is {51}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Emergency Medical Center?
SC.A: The total flow input by Emergency Medical Center is {106}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 310? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {321} from {TCM Hospital} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 78? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {51} from {Emergency Medical Center} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 151 and 246? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {194} from {Rural Township Clinic} to {TCM Hospital}, a flow of {201} from {Rural Township Clinic} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from TCM Hospital to Rural Township Clinic or from Rural Township Clinic to TCM Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {TCM Hospital} to {Rural Township Clinic} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Maternal and Child Health Center to Emergency Medical Center, from Rural Township Clinic to TCM Hospital, or from Maternal and Child Health Center to Rural Township Clinic?
NC.A: The flow from {Rural Township Clinic} to {TCM Hospital} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {TCM Hospital}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Maternal and Child Health Center} and {TCM Hospital}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Maternal and Child Health Center, Arc TCM Hospital, Arc Rural Township Clinic, Arc Emergency Medical Center}.
